title: Fireblocks‚Äô Pivotal $2.34M W Token Transfer to Jump Crypto Unveiled
body: BitcoinWorld Fireblocks‚Äô Pivotal $2.34M W Token Transfer to Jump Crypto Unveiled The world of cryptocurrency is a fascinating, fast-paced arena where every on-chain movement can tell a story. Recently, a significant transaction caught the eye of keen observers: a substantial crypto transfer involving one of the industry‚Äôs leading custody solutions, Fireblocks. This movement, totaling 33.1 million W tokens valued at $2.34 million, wasn‚Äôt just any transaction; it was directed to a wallet strongly linked to Jump Crypto, a name synonymous with significant influence in the blockchain space. What does this mean for the interconnected world of DeFi, especially for projects like Wormhole? Let‚Äôs dive deep into the implications of this pivotal transfer. Unpacking the Fireblocks Transfer: What Just Happened? In the intricate web of blockchain transactions, every large movement is scrutinized, and for good reason. On-chain analyst @ai_9684xtpa on X highlighted that crypto custody firm Fireblocks executed a transfer of 33.1 million W tokens, amounting to approximately $2.34 million, to a wallet believed to be associated with Jump Crypto. This occurred roughly eight hours prior to the analyst‚Äôs report, sparking immediate interest. For those unfamiliar, Fireblocks is a cornerstone in the institutional crypto landscape. They provide a secure platform for moving, storing, and issuing digital assets, serving hundreds of financial institutions globally. Their reputation for top-tier security and compliance makes any transaction originating from them noteworthy. When a firm like Fireblocks moves such a significant sum of a specific token, it often signals strategic maneuvers or operational shifts within the broader crypto ecosystem. Key aspects of this specific transfer include: Sender: Fireblocks, a leading crypto custody and settlement platform. Recipient: A wallet linked to Jump Crypto, a prominent venture capital firm and market maker. Asset: W tokens, the native governance token of the Wormhole protocol. Value: 33.1 million W tokens, approximately $2.34 million USD at the time of transfer. Significance: A large, institutional-level transfer suggesting a strategic purpose rather than a simple user transaction. The Role of Jump Crypto : A Strategic Connection The recipient of this substantial Fireblocks transfer, Jump Crypto, isn‚Äôt just another name in the crypto world; it‚Äôs a powerhouse. As the crypto arm of the quantitative trading firm Jump Trading, Jump Crypto has a deep footprint across various facets of the digital asset industry, from venture capital investments to market making and infrastructure development. Their involvement with Wormhole is particularly strong, given that they were both an early investor and the parent company of the cross-chain protocol. This close relationship between Jump Crypto and Wormhole adds a layer of intrigue to the transaction. While Wormhole announced its transition to independent operations in late 2023, Jump Crypto‚Äôs continued influence and strategic interest in the protocol remain evident. A transfer of W tokens to Jump Crypto could signify several things: Strategic Allocation: It might be part of a pre-agreed distribution, a treasury management decision, or a move to bolster liquidity for the W token. Market Making Activities: Jump Crypto is a major market maker, and receiving a large tranche of W tokens could indicate an intent to provide deeper liquidity on various exchanges, facilitating smoother trading for the token. Operational Funding: Even after independence, there might be ongoing operational or development funding agreements between Jump Crypto and Wormhole, for which W tokens could be used. Vesting or Unlock Schedules: The transfer could align with a vesting schedule for early investors or team members associated with Jump Crypto, who supported Wormhole‚Äôs development. Understanding Jump Crypto‚Äôs multifaceted role helps us interpret the potential motivations behind such a significant on-chain movement. Understanding Wormhole : Bridging the Blockchain Divide At the heart of this transaction are the W tokens , which are inextricably linked to the Wormhole protocol. But what exactly is Wormhole, and why is its native token so valuable? Wormhole is a leading cross-chain interoperability protocol. In simpler terms, it‚Äôs a bridge that allows different blockchains to communicate and transfer assets and information between each other. Imagine a world where Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, and Avalanche are all isolated islands. Wormhole builds bridges between these islands, enabling seamless travel and trade. This capability is crucial for the growth of the multi-chain ecosystem, as it allows for greater liquidity, composability, and user experience across various decentralized applications (dApps). Key features and importance of Wormhole include: Interoperability: Connects over 30 blockchains, including major EVM and non-EVM chains. Asset Transfer: Enables the secure transfer of tokens (wrapped assets) between chains. Message Passing: Allows dApps to send arbitrary data and execute cross-chain commands. Decentralization: Governed by a decentralized network of validators (Guardians). Independence: Recently transitioned to an independent entity, signaling a new phase of growth and community governance. The success and utility of Wormhole are vital for a truly interconnected blockchain future, making its governance token, W, a significant asset in the broader crypto landscape. The Significance of W Tokens : Governance and Beyond The 33.1 million W tokens transferred by Fireblocks are not just arbitrary digital units; they are the native governance token of the Wormhole protocol. The introduction of W tokens marked a significant step in Wormhole‚Äôs journey towards decentralization and community governance. What does holding W tokens entail? Governance Rights: W token holders have the power to propose and vote on key decisions regarding the Wormhole protocol‚Äôs future. This includes upgrades, parameter changes, fee structures, and the addition of new supported chains. Ecosystem Participation: Holding W tokens allows for active participation in the Wormhole DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization), shaping the direction and development of a critical piece of blockchain infrastructure. Potential Utility: While primarily a governance token, W tokens could also accrue additional utility in the future, such as staking rewards, access to premium features, or integration into various dApps built on or leveraging Wormhole. A large transfer of W tokens to a major entity like Jump Crypto could be interpreted as a consolidation of governance power, a strategic distribution for liquidity provision, or a preparation for future ecosystem initiatives. It highlights the growing importance of governance tokens in the decentralized world and how major players manage their stakes in crucial protocols. Why This Crypto Transfer Matters: Insights and Implications This particular crypto transfer from Fireblocks to Jump Crypto is more than just a large transaction; it offers several key insights into the current dynamics of the crypto market and the strategic moves of its major players. Transparency and On-Chain Analysis The fact that this transfer was quickly identified and reported by on-chain analysts like @ai_9684xtpa underscores the unparalleled transparency of public blockchains. Every transaction, regardless of its size, is recorded and verifiable. This allows for real-time monitoring of institutional movements, providing valuable insights into market sentiment, potential strategic partnerships, and the operational activities of major entities. This transparency is a double-edged sword: while it offers unparalleled insights, it also means that every move is under public scrutiny. Strategic Alliances and Ecosystem Development The relationship between Jump Crypto and Wormhole is a prime example of how venture capital firms actively participate in and shape the ecosystems they invest in. This transfer could be a reinforcement of their commitment to Wormhole‚Äôs success, perhaps by providing liquidity for the W token or preparing for new initiatives that require significant token holdings. Such large movements often precede or accompany significant developments within a protocol‚Äôs roadmap. Market Impact and Liquidity While a $2.34 million transfer might not drastically move the entire crypto market, it is significant for the W token itself. If these tokens are intended for market-making activities, it could lead to increased liquidity and tighter spreads, benefiting traders and investors. Conversely, if they are intended for a large, private allocation, the market impact might be minimal but the underlying strategic signal remains strong. Challenges and Opportunities in Cross-Chain Interoperability The continued development and strategic support for protocols like Wormhole highlight the ongoing need for robust cross-chain solutions. While interoperability offers immense opportunities for growth and innovation in DeFi, it also presents challenges, particularly around security. Large transfers like this one, managed by secure custody solutions like Fireblocks, emphasize the importance of secure infrastructure in navigating the complexities of multi-chain environments. Actionable Insights for Readers: Monitor On-Chain Data: Keep an eye on significant institutional transfers using tools like blockchain explorers or following reputable on-chain analysts. These movements can often signal upcoming developments or strategic shifts. Understand Token Utility: For any token you‚Äôre interested in, delve into its utility and governance model. Knowing what the token represents (like W tokens for Wormhole governance) helps interpret large transfers. Research Institutional Involvement: Understand which major firms (like Fireblocks and Jump Crypto) are involved in a project. Their actions can provide clues about a project‚Äôs health and future trajectory. Conclusion: A Glimpse into Strategic Crypto Operations The recent transfer of $2.34 million in W tokens from Fireblocks to a wallet linked with Jump Crypto is more than just a transaction; it‚Äôs a window into the strategic operations that underpin the institutional crypto landscape. It underscores the vital roles played by secure custody providers like Fireblocks, influential investors and developers like Jump Crypto, and critical infrastructure protocols like Wormhole. As the crypto ecosystem continues to mature, such on-chain movements will remain crucial indicators of health, development, and strategic intent. Keeping a close watch on these flows provides invaluable context for understanding the complex and ever-evolving world of digital assets. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping blockchain technology and institutional adoption. title: Early Crypto Adopter Expects XRP Parabolic Price Ascent. Here‚Äôs the Timeline
body: XRP‚Äôs current market trajectory may be on the verge of a historic shift, according to early crypto adopter and outspoken analyst Crypto Bitlord. With XRP trading at $2.18, Bitlord took to X to declare that the token is ‚Äúway overdue‚Äù for a parabolic explosion. He likened the anticipated price move to a ‚Äúskateboard ramp‚Äù, suggesting a nearly vertical ascent, a style of price action that historically follows periods of extended consolidation. This bold prediction has captured the attention of XRP enthusiasts and crypto traders alike, as many wonder whether Bitlord‚Äôs timing finally aligns with market conditions. Known for his early advocacy of XRP, Bitlord has in the past called out pivotal buying moments that preceded sharp rallies, lending weight to his recent statement. Technical Patterns Support Explosive Move Chart analysts are observing the emergence of a bullish cup-and-handle formation on XRP‚Äôs short-term timeframes. This classical pattern often precedes a strong breakout, and in XRP‚Äôs case, points toward an immediate target around $3.35, a level that sits about 54% above its current price. I‚Äôm expecting $XRP to begin its parabolic ascent shortly. The chart will look like a skateboard ramp. Poppin vertical. -Way overdue now. ‚Äî Crypto Bitlord (@crypto_bitlord7) July 2, 2025 In addition, indicators such as the Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) and Relative Strength Index (RSI) are flashing early bullish signals, suggesting that XRP may be preparing for significant momentum. Several analysts, including Ali Martinez and JD, have cited these signals in recent weeks as evidence that the groundwork for a parabolic move is being laid. One key resistance level to watch is in the $2.47 to $2.80 range; clearing this zone with volume could open the gates to rapid price acceleration. Legal Clarity and Institutional Expansion Beyond technicals, fundamental developments are playing an equally crucial role in shaping sentiment. Ripple‚Äôs protracted legal battle with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has seen major resolutions in recent months. While Judge Torres recently rejected the proposed settlement motion, Ripple‚Äôs decision to drop its counter-appeal, followed by indications that the SEC may abandon its appeal, has significantly reduced regulatory uncertainty surrounding XRP. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 This legal clarity comes just as Ripple continues expanding its global payment infrastructure. XRP is increasingly being used in Ripple‚Äôs On-Demand Liquidity (ODL) network, supporting real-time cross-border payments. These developments lend long-term confidence to XRP‚Äôs utility, and they serve as a foundation for institutional adoption, even as the retail market awaits a breakout. Speculation and Sentiment in the Current Market Despite Bitlord‚Äôs high-confidence post, it‚Äôs worth noting that some traders remain cautious. On-chain data shows mixed signals, with modest declines in active wallet activity and some profit-taking from larger holders. However, these patterns are not unusual before large upward moves, especially when traders reallocate capital in anticipation of volatility. Historically, XRP‚Äôs strongest rallies have followed long periods of stagnation, which may be precisely what‚Äôs unfolding now. Crypto Bitlord believes the timing is right, stating that the window for this ramp-like breakout could open ‚Äúwithin 24 hours.‚Äù While that timeline is speculative, it‚Äôs grounded in a context of building pressure across multiple market layers. At $2.18, XRP sits on the edge of a possible parabolic ascent. Crypto Bitlord, a seasoned market participant, anticipates a near-vertical rally, driven by bullish technicals and strengthened fundamentals. The resistance levels are clear, the sentiment is cautiously optimistic, and the legal clouds are beginning to clear. Whether this moment produces the long-awaited breakout or simply sets the stage for one, XRP‚Äôs trajectory is poised to shift dramatically, and soon. title: Top Pi Network Holders Revealed ‚Äì Are You on the List?
body: The post Top Pi Network Holders Revealed ‚Äì Are You on the List? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News A fun and viral classification system is circulating online, categorizing Pi Coin holders into playful sea creatures based on how much Pi Coin they‚Äôve mined. From Shrimp to Humpback, this new system has sparked excitement among Pioneers‚Äîand it might just change how you see your Pi Network holdings. What‚Äôs This Pi Coin Ranking All About? In a lighthearted post on X (formerly Twitter), Pi Network‚Äôs co-founder Dr. Nicolas Kokkalis shared a unique classification system for Pi holders. Inspired by sea creatures, the ranking assigns each user a category based on their Pi Coin balance. The aim? To boost community engagement as Pi Network gears up for major developments in its decentralized ecosystem. Here‚Äôs the Full Classification System Shrimp: Less than 1 Pi Coin Crab: 1 to 9 Pi Octopus: 10 to 49 Pi Fish: 50 to 99 Pi Dolphin: 100 to 499 Pi Shark: 500 to 999 Pi Whale: 1,000 to 4,999 Pi Humpback: 5,000+ Pi This whimsical ranking has quickly become a talking point within the Pi Network community and is even being adopted as a badge of pride among users. Most Pioneers Are Shrimps ‚Äì Here‚Äôs Why Analysts estimate that around 70% of Pi Network users hold less than 1 Pi Coin, placing them in the Shrimp category. This high concentration of smaller holders highlights how early many users still are in their Pi mining journey. Meanwhile, the top 100 wallets control over 96% of the Pi Coin supply, although that includes burn addresses and liquidity pools. So while Whales and Humpbacks hold most of the Pi Network‚Äôs circulating supply, they make up only a tiny fraction of the user base. [post_titles_links postid=‚Äù477537‚Ä≥] What Does This Mean for the Pi Network Price? As Pi Network prepares for mainnet migration and potential exchange listings , understanding holder distribution becomes crucial. If most users are still Shrimp, this suggests mass adoption is still in progress‚Äîand that larger holders could impact Pi Network price significantly during initial trading. This fun classification might not be official, but it‚Äôs clearly uniting Pioneers and adding a viral spark to the Pi community. Final Thoughts Whether you‚Äôre a proud Shrimp or an elusive Humpback, this ranking system is more than just a joke‚Äîit‚Äôs a community-driven effort to build excitement and identity within the Pi ecosystem. With Pi Coin possibly approaching its next big milestone, every sea creature in the ocean of Pioneers is watching closely. [article_inside_subscriber_shortcode title=‚ÄùNever Miss a Beat in the Crypto World!‚Äù description=‚ÄùStay ahead with breaking news, expert analysis, and real-time updates on the latest trends in Bitcoin, altcoins, DeFi, NFTs, and more.‚Äù category_name=‚ÄùNews‚Äù category_id=‚Äù6‚Ä≥] FAQs How can I check my Pi Coin balance to know my sea creature rank? This balance determines your sea creature rank based on the shared classification system. What are the benefits of being in a higher rank like Whale or Humpback in Pi Network? While the sea creature ranking is primarily for community engagement and pride, being a ‚ÄúWhale‚Äù or ‚ÄúHumpback‚Äù signifies a large Pi holding. This could potentially translate to more significant influence within the Pi ecosystem, increased visibility, and a greater share if/when Pi gains substantial market value or undergoes exchange listings. How can I move up from Shrimp to a higher rank like Dolphin or Shark in Pi Network? To move up from ‚ÄúShrimp‚Äù to a higher rank in Pi Network, you need to accumulate more Pi Coins. This is primarily done through active mobile mining (checking in daily), inviting new users to your referral team, building a strong security circle, engaging with Pi apps, and running a Pi Node, all of which boost your mining rate. What happens to my rank if I transfer or lose some of my Pi Coins? If you transfer or lose some of your Pi Coins, your total balance will decrease. Consequently, your sea creature rank will adjust downwards to reflect your new, lower Pi Coin holding. The ranking system is directly based on your current Pi Coin balance, so any change in your balance will affect your assigned category.

title: Ripple CEO Breaks Silence on Linqto Scandal: ‚ÄúNo Business Relationship‚Äù
body: The post Ripple CEO Breaks Silence on Linqto Scandal: ‚ÄúNo Business Relationship‚Äù appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News As investor panic spreads through the XRP community, Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse has broken his silence, offering a firm statement that sets the record straight on Ripple‚Äôs involvement with troubled private equity platform Linqto. In a tweet that comes amid mounting scrutiny and a potential bankruptcy filing at Linqto, Garlinghouse wrote: ‚ÄúTo be clear, on Ripple‚Äôs end: What we know from our records is Linqto owns 4.7M shares of Ripple, solely purchased on the secondary market from other Ripple shareholders (never directly from Ripple).‚Äù That line says a lot about the controversy that is flaring up. Read on for all the clarity you need. Linqto in Crisis Mode Linqto, once touted as a gateway for retail investors to access high-profile private companies like Ripple and Circle, is now facing federal investigations and a looming financial collapse. The platform abruptly halted operations, froze user accounts, and sparked outrage with a proposed refund model that only returns original investments, cutting investors off from any profits made. Garlinghouse: ‚ÄúNo Business Relationship‚Äù With Linqto Garlinghouse didn‚Äôt stop at clarifying share ownership. He added: ‚ÄúApart from Linqto being a shareholder, Ripple has never had a business relationship with Linqto, nor have they participated in our financing rounds. We stopped approving more Linqto purchases on secondary markets in late 2024 amid growing skepticism.‚Äù Understandably, there have been many questions from those who believed they were buying Ripple shares from Linqto, and what happens next. To be clear, on Ripple‚Äôs end: What we know from our records is Linqto owns 4.7M shares of Ripple, solely purchased on the secondary market‚Ä¶ https://t.co/XHstpwwmIL ‚Äî Brad Garlinghouse (@bgarlinghouse) July 2, 2025 This distancing move sends a clear message: Ripple wants no part in the fallout. And for good reason. The blowback from Linqto‚Äôs meltdown is already threatening investor trust across the broader crypto equity market. Pre-IPO platforms, once hailed as democratizing access, are now under fire for lacking transparency and investor protection. John Deaton Calls for Calm Should you be panicking? Probably not. Attorney John Deaton, who is also a Linqto investor, recently addressed the growing anxiety within the XRP community. In a detailed post, he acknowledged how deeply personal the situation is for many ‚Äì calling out that some investors have their entire savings or retirement funds tied up in the platform. Deaton struck a reassuring tone, explaining that Linqto has no debt, that shares are accounted for, and that a bankruptcy process could actually offer protection and transparency. ‚ÄúThere is good reason to believe you‚Äôre getting your money back ‚Äì and it‚Äôs very possible to realize the upside of those investments,‚Äù he wrote. His message was clear: stay calm, stay informed, and don‚Äôt lose hope. For Linqto customers, I‚Äôm one of you, as you can see. I‚Äôm well aware that people have less than me (some have much more than me also) on the platform, but it represents their entire investment portfolio or retirement. I get how unnerving that is. I‚Äôve become familiar with‚Ä¶ https://t.co/tJy1OXAQxM ‚Äî John E Deaton (@JohnEDeaton1) July 1, 2025 For now, while Ripple may not be legally tied to Linqto, the scandal‚Äôs proximity is enough to raise red flags. Garlinghouse‚Äôs clarity certainly makes the picture clearer though.

title: Alarming Reality: Only 3 VC-backed Crypto Projects Soar Past $1B FDV
body: BitcoinWorld Alarming Reality: Only 3 VC-backed Crypto Projects Soar Past $1B FDV Are you invested in the future of decentralized finance? Then prepare for a sobering truth from the crypto world. Despite the hype and significant funding pouring into the space, a recent analysis reveals a concerning trend for VC-backed crypto projects . As of mid-2025, a mere handful of these highly anticipated ventures have managed to break through the coveted $1 billion fully diluted valuation (FDV) mark, leaving many investors grappling with significant losses. What‚Äôs the Current State of VC-backed Crypto Projects? The crypto market is known for its volatility, but recent data from analyst @ahboyash on X paints a particularly stark picture. Out of 56 VC-backed crypto projects that launched their tokens this year, only three‚ÄîKaito, Story Protocol, and Walrus‚Äîhave achieved a fully diluted valuation (FDV) exceeding $1 billion. This isn‚Äôt just a minor blip; it signifies a widespread challenge for a sector that has attracted billions in institutional capital. Typically, venture capitalists inject substantial funds, often ranging from $20 million to $100 million, into these projects at their seed stages. These investments usually come with a three-year lockup period post-Token Generation Event (TGE), meaning investors cannot sell their tokens immediately. The current reality, however, is that many of these tokens are now trading well below their last fundraising valuations, leaving early investors ‚Äòunderwater‚Äô and facing considerable paper losses. This stark contrast between initial investment hype and current market performance raises critical questions about the sustainability and valuation practices within the crypto venture capital landscape. Why Are Crypto FDV Targets So Elusive? The concept of Crypto FDV , or Fully Diluted Valuation, is crucial here. It represents the total market capitalization if all tokens intended to be released into circulation were available. While a high FDV can indicate potential future growth and market confidence, achieving and sustaining a $1 billion FDV is a monumental task. Several factors contribute to this elusiveness: Overvaluation at Seed Stage: Many projects might have been overvalued during their initial fundraising rounds, setting unrealistic expectations for their future market performance. This often happens in bull markets where FOMO (Fear Of Missing Out) drives aggressive valuations. Market Saturation and Competition: The sheer volume of new projects entering the market makes it difficult for any single one to capture significant mindshare and user adoption. Standing out requires more than just capital; it demands true innovation and effective execution. Lack of Product-Market Fit: Despite innovative ideas, many projects struggle to develop a tangible product or service that truly resonates with a broad user base or solves a real-world problem. Capital alone cannot compensate for a lack of genuine utility. Macroeconomic Headwinds: The broader economic climate, including inflation, interest rate hikes, and geopolitical tensions, along with regulatory uncertainties, can significantly impact investor sentiment and liquidity in the crypto space, making it harder for projects to grow their FDV. Tokenomics Challenges: Poorly designed tokenomics, including excessive supply, high inflation rates, or insufficient utility for the token within its ecosystem, can inherently depress its value, making a high FDV unattainable. What Does This Mean for Token Valuations? The current scenario has profound implications for token valuations across the board, especially for projects that received significant venture capital backing. When tokens trade below their last fundraising valuations, it sends a strong signal to the market about the project‚Äôs perceived value and future prospects. This can lead to a vicious cycle: Investor Confidence Erosion: Early investors seeing their portfolios underwater may lose faith, potentially leading to sell-offs once lockups expire, further depressing prices and creating more selling pressure. Difficulty in Future Fundraising: Projects struggling with low valuations will find it much harder to raise subsequent rounds of funding. This stifles their development and growth, as capital is essential for hiring talent, marketing, and product development. Talent Retention Issues: A struggling project with poor token performance might find it challenging to attract and retain top talent. Token incentives, a common perk in crypto startups, become less attractive when their value is declining. The situation highlights a significant disconnect between the initial optimistic projections during fundraising and the harsh realities of market adoption and utility. It underscores that a high initial valuation does not guarantee sustained success or positive token valuations in the long run. Actionable Insights from Crypto Market Analysis This deep dive into crypto market analysis offers crucial lessons for both investors and project founders navigating the volatile waters of the digital asset space: For Investors: Conduct rigorous due diligence beyond just the VC names backing a project. Focus on fundamental metrics like product adoption, revenue models (if applicable), active user base, community engagement, and realistic tokenomics. Don‚Äôt solely rely on seed-stage valuations as an indicator of future success. Understand lockup schedules and potential sell pressure that might come when early investors are able to unload their tokens. For Project Founders: Prioritize building a sustainable product with genuine utility over chasing inflated valuations. Focus on user acquisition, retention, and community building from day one. Be transparent about development milestones and challenges. Realistic tokenomics that incentivize long-term holding and utility are paramount for sustainable growth. For VCs: While early investment is key, perhaps a more cautious approach to valuation and a stronger emphasis on post-investment support for product development and market fit is needed. The current trend suggests a need for re-evaluation of investment strategies in a maturing market, moving towards more selective and value-driven investments. Navigating Venture Capital Crypto‚Äôs Future The challenges facing venture capital crypto investments in 2025 are a clear indicator that the ‚Äòspray and pray‚Äô approach prevalent in earlier bull markets is no longer viable. The market is maturing, and with maturity comes a demand for substance over speculation. While VC funding remains a vital lifeline for innovation in the blockchain space, the focus is shifting. Investors are increasingly scrutinizing whitepapers, roadmaps, and, most importantly, working products and active user bases. The success stories of Kaito, Story Protocol, and Walrus, though few, likely share common threads of strong fundamentals, clear utility, and perhaps more realistic initial valuations or exceptional execution in bringing their visions to fruition. This trend signals a shift towards a more professionalized and accountable ecosystem for venture capital crypto . Conclusion The stark reality of only three out of 56 VC-backed crypto projects surpassing a $1 billion FDV in 2025 serves as a potent wake-up call for the entire crypto ecosystem. It underscores the critical importance of fundamental value, sustainable growth, and genuine utility over speculative hype. While venture capital continues to play a pivotal role in fostering innovation, both investors and project teams must adapt to a more discerning market. The path to long-term success in crypto is paved not just with capital, but with robust technology, dedicated communities, and real-world impact. This period of recalibration, though painful for some, ultimately strengthens the foundation for a more resilient and mature decentralized future. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping token valuations and institutional adoption. This post Alarming Reality: Only 3 VC-backed Crypto Projects Soar Past $1B FDV first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Bitcoin Holds Above $100K But Critical Data Bottoms! What Does It Mean for BTC?
body: Bitcoin (BTC) is exhibiting volatile movements ahead of the Nonfarm Payrolls data, one of the data that the FED follows when making interest rate decisions. Bitcoin, which saw above $107,000 during FED Chairman Jerome Powell's speech yesterday, fell to $105,000 afterwards. Related News: FED Chairman Jerome Powell Talks About Interest Rate Cuts and Donald Trump! "If Trump Didn't Exist..." - Bitcoin (BTC) Moved! While wondering in which direction the volatility in Bitcoin will intensify and how the price will move, 10x Research stated that the CME Bitcoin futures premium fell to 4.3%, the lowest level since October 2023. Speaking to Coindesk, 10X Research founder Markus Thielen said that the decline in the CME Bitcoin futures premium indicates weakening institutional demand. ‚ÄúThe annualized premium for 3-month CME Bitcoin futures has fallen from 10% earlier this year to 4.3% currently. This is the lowest level since 2023.‚Äù The CME Bitcoin futures premium represents the difference between the spot price and the futures price. Stating that this decline in the CME Bitcoin futures premium came despite the BTC price holding above $ 100,000, Thielen said, ‚Äúthis indicates that institutional interest is decreasing, expectations for further price increases are weakening, and price uncertainty is increasing.‚Äù *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Bitcoin Holds Above $100K But Critical Data Bottoms! What Does It Mean for BTC?

title: US Treasury Freezes Aeza‚Äôs $350K Crypto Wallet in Bulletproof-Hosting Crackdown
body: The U.S. Treasury Department sanctioned Russia-based Aeza Group for aiding cybercriminal operations and froze a linked cryptocurrency wallet holding over $350,000. OFAC further named four Aeza Group officials, Penzev, Bozoyan, Gast, and Knyazev, for their roles in the organization. Notably, Aeza Group, a known bulletproof hosting (BPH) provider, was sanctioned by the Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC) for offering secure and anonymous infrastructure to cybercriminals. The St. Petersburg-based hosting provider has been supporting ransomware groups like BianLian and the info-stealer operators behind RedLine, Lumma, and Meduza. Two affiliated companies and Aeza International Ltd., a UK-based front company, were sanctioned in coordination with the United Kingdom‚Äôs National Crime Agency. US Treasury Freezes Aeza Crypto Wallet Used to Obfuscate and Move Funds Bulletproof hosting refers to internet hosting services that provide infrastructure to cybercriminals, offering servers designed to evade detection and resist takedown efforts. These services are commonly used by ransomware groups, data thieves, and online drug vendors to carry out and hide illegal operations from law enforcement. According to Acting Under Secretary of the Treasury for Terrorism and Financial Intelligence Bradley T. Smith, ‚ÄúCybercriminals continue to rely heavily on BPH service providers like Aeza Group to facilitate disruptive ransomware attacks, steal U.S. technology, and sell black-market drugs.‚Äù The Treasury Department further alleges that the platform enabled attacks on U.S. defense and tech firms and aided the Russian darknet drug market BlackSprut. Today, OFAC sanctioned Aeza Group for providing bulletproof hosting to cybercriminals conducting ransomware attacks. The designation included 1 crypto address, which Aeza Group used for payments. Read our blog to learn more: https://t.co/fyUHVNZAEp ‚Äî Chainalysis (@chainalysis) July 1, 2025 As part of the sanction, OFAC froze a TRON-based cryptocurrency wallet used by Aeza Group in which Chainalysis revealed to have functioned as a hub for collecting payments, cashing out funds through various exchanges, and occasionally receiving direct customer payments. The on-chain analysis linked the wallet to over $350,000 in cryptocurrency, with some transactions traced to darknet vendors and malware distributors. OFAC Efforts to Disrupt Cybercrime Infrastructure The Treasury‚Äôs latest action indicates its continued effort toward dismantling the infrastructure that supports cybercrime, rather than solely pursuing individual hackers after the fact. ‚ÄúTreasury remains committed to dismantling this ecosystem in close coordination with international partners,‚Äù said Bradley T. Smith. Notably, the OFAC carried out a similar move in February 2025, when it sanctioned ZServers, a known bulletproof hosting provider used by cybercriminals to evade law enforcement. Also, OFAC sanctions on Aeza Group are not the first time the department has clamped down on Russia-linked crime. On June 12, 2024, OFAC imposed sanctions targeting Russia‚Äôs war economy , including restrictions on access to U.S. software and IT services. The sanction also includes secondary sanctions on foreign firms, particularly Chinese semiconductor suppliers supporting Moscow. OFAC also sanctioned Russian national Andrey Dmitriyevich Sudakov for allegedly laundering cryptocurrency from gold sales via front companies in the UAE and Hong Kong. OFAC has imposed economic sanctions against a Russian national for alleged money laundering through cryptocurrency. What will happen next? #OFAC #Cryptocurrency https://t.co/QuCuGB0LDN ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) June 13, 2024 Another notable sanction to curb illicit trades includes OFAC-sanctioned Iranian national Behrouz Parsarad , administrator of the dismantled darknet marketplace Nemesis. OFAC sanctions Behrouz Parsarad, the Iranian administrator of Nemesis darknet marketplace, targeting 49 cryptocurrency addresses linked to illicit activities. #OFAC #Darknet https://t.co/2zMpF3Nhh9 ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) March 5, 2025 The marketplace facilitated $30 million in illegal drug sales, including fentanyl. Parsarad allegedly tried to revive the platform after its March 2024 takedown. Notably, the sanctions target his crypto infrastructure, including 44 Bitcoin and five Monero addresses. The post US Treasury Freezes Aeza‚Äôs $350K Crypto Wallet in Bulletproof-Hosting Crackdown appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: KBC to launch crypto trading for retail investors from Belgium and Central, Eastern Europe
body: KBC Group is preparing to offer retail clients in Belgium the opportunity to invest in major cryptocurrencies this fall, local media unveiled. With the move, the large financial services company is taking the lead among Belgian banks, which have been shunning the decentralized digital assets until now. KBC to allow cryptocurrency trading through Bolero Belgian bank KBC will let retail customers trade Bitcoin (BTC) and Ether (ETH) via its investment platform Bolero in the coming months, Belga news agency reported on Wednesday. The initiative is a first in Belgium, where traditional banks have been reluctant to enter the crypto market, with Belgian investors turning to global trading venues such as Coinbase and Binance or using the services of neobanks like Revolut and Bunq. Other major banks in Belgium, like Belfius, ING, and BNP Paribas Fortis, remain cautious, the report notes, pointing out that only the state-owned Belfius has so far signaled interest in exploring crypto through its Rebel platform. KBC is currently in the process of obtaining regulatory approval to operate as a crypto asset service provider, according to an article published by the Flemish daily De Tijd. The bank has indicated its offering will focus on investor education, security, and regulatory compliance. Financial authorities are expected to greenlight it by the fall, the Dutch-language newspaper added. The group is delving into crypto amid the enforcement of the European Union‚Äôs Markets in Crypto-Assets (MiCA) law, which aims to establish uniform rules for the industry across the bloc while improving oversight, including compliance with anti-money laundering requirements. KBC‚Äôs decision to facilitate crypto trading for its retail clients is meant to address growing investor interest in cryptocurrencies in the Benelux country, particularly among young Belgians, the media reports noted. A survey conducted by Belgium‚Äôs Financial Services and Markets Authority ( FSMA ) showed that 43% of Belgian investors under 29 have already bought crypto. The share of such investors grows to 45% in the age segment under 30. European banks flock into the crypto market By taking the path toward entering the cryptocurrency market, KBC is joining other European banking institutions that are preparing similar moves. Deutsche Bank is finalizing its project to launch a crypto custody service in 2026, according to Bloomberg. In another report this week, the news agency revealed that Germany‚Äôs giant Sparkassen-Finanzgruppe will allow users of its banking app to trade cryptocurrencies within a year. Meanwhile, one of Italy‚Äôs top banks, UniCredit , is launching a five-year, dollar-denominated investment certificate tied to BlackRock‚Äôs iShares Bitcoin Trust ETF. The product is targeting professional clients and offers capital protection at maturity. The KBC Group , which is the second-largest Belgian bank-insurer, is focused on providing services to private clients and small to medium-sized enterprises in Belgium, but also in several developing markets in Central and Eastern Europe, including Bulgaria, the Czech Republic, Hungary, and Slovakia. Finance industry players in the CEE region have also witnessed a rapidly growing interest in crypto investment opportunities. In response, Poland‚Äôs largest insurance firm, PZU , announced in May a Bitcoin fund offering that will give Polish investors exposure to the leading cryptocurrency under EU rules. PZU‚Äôs move comes despite challenges stemming from the delayed implementation of Europe‚Äôs latest regulations in the country. A renewed push in Warsaw to transpose the EU legislation into national law has stirred the local crypto community. Members of the industry fear the standards their government is drafting are actually stricter than MiCA, going beyond what Brussels is prescribing. Representatives of the crypto sector are warning that the upcoming Polish regulations favor large foreign companies while forcing smaller domestic crypto firms to look for more favorable conditions abroad. title: Bit Digital Ditches Bitcoin Mining for an All-In Ethereum Staking Play, Raises $163M
body: Nasdaq-listed Bit Digital has completed a $163 million equity raise specifically to purchase Ethereum, marking a dramatic pivot from Bitcoin mining to ETH treasury accumulation as the company seeks to become a ‚Äúpure play‚Äù staking operation. According to the announcement , B. Riley Securities led the underwritten public offering, which closed on July 1, with underwriters exercising their full option to purchase additional shares, bringing the total proceeds to approximately $162.9 million after fees. The company‚Äôs revenue from Bitcoin mining decreased by 64% in Q1 2025 compared to the previous year, with earnings of just 83.3 Bitcoin during the quarter, representing an 80% decline from the prior year‚Äôs levels. Bitcoin mining now accounts for only 31% of their total revenue, down from 72% in the same quarter last year, according to company financial reports . Strategic Shift from Mining to Staking Infrastructure Bit Digital began accumulating ETH and building staking infrastructure in 2022, positioning itself ahead of what would become a broader institutional trend toward Ethereum treasury strategies. As of March 2025, the company held 24,434.2 ETH, valued at approximately $44.6 million , alongside 417.6 BTC, worth $34.5 million, with plans to convert its Bitcoin holdings into Ethereum over time. $BTBT Market Expansion: On June 25, 2025, Bit Digital, Inc. announced its subsidiary WhiteFiber, Inc.'s proposed IPO and its shift to focus solely on Ethereum staking, holding 24,434 ETH valued at approximately $44.6 million. The company plans to wind down its bitcoin‚Ä¶ ‚Äî SEC Filings Digest (@USCorpFilings) June 25, 2025 According to the New York-based firm, the April 2024 Bitcoin halving event, combined with increased network difficulty, created the perfect storm that made mining operations increasingly unprofitable. Bit Digital now operates approximately 21,568 ETH in native staking protocols, earning 211 ETH in staking rewards during Q1 2025 alone, a 72% increase from the previous year. Their cloud services revenue also surged 84% year-over-year to $14.8 million, demonstrating the company‚Äôs successful diversification beyond traditional crypto mining operations. Company executives announced they have initiated a strategic alternatives process for their Bitcoin mining assets, with proceeds from all sales to be redeployed into additional ETH purchases. Growing Institutional Momentum Behind Ethereum Treasury Strategies Bit Digital‚Äôs move is part of a broader accelerating institutional adoption of Ethereum as a corporate treasury asset, following similar strategies deployed by other public companies throughout 2025. SharpLink Gaming became the world‚Äôs largest publicly traded Ethereum holder in June, accumulating 188,478 ETH worth approximately $457 million through aggressive buying campaigns. SharpLink Gaming has emerged as the world‚Äôs largest publicly traded holder of Ethereum (ETH), after acquiring 176,271 ETH for $463 million. #ETH #Sharplink https://t.co/ynahjYt7Hd ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) June 13, 2025 BitMine Immersion Technologies recently raised $250 million in a private placement specifically for Ethereum purchases, sending its stock price up 511% in a single trading session. Healthcare technology firm BioNexus Gene Lab also adopted Ethereum as its primary treasury asset , becoming the first Nasdaq-listed healthcare company to implement such a strategy. Institutional investors appear to be gravitating toward Ethereum‚Äôs staking capabilities due to its promising yield on treasury holdings. Thomas Lee of Fundstrat Global Advisors, who recently joined BitMine‚Äôs board, described Ethereum as a ‚Äú higher beta ‚Äù asset than Bitcoin due to its foundational role in stablecoin transactions and decentralized finance applications. BitMine announces $250M private placement in bid to become largest corporate ETH holder. #Ethereum #BitMine https://t.co/p1Io4UVP6T ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) June 30, 2025 Stablecoin transaction volume, which primarily occurs on Ethereum‚Äôs network, could drive significant demand for ETH as the market grows from its current value of $250 billion to $2 trillion by 2028, according to projections from the U.S. Treasury . Bit Digital‚Äôs $163 million commitment comes as Ethereum consolidates between $2,400 and $2,800 , following an 80% surge from April lows that attracted institutional attention and validated corporate treasury strategies focused on the world‚Äôs second-largest cryptocurrency. The post Bit Digital Ditches Bitcoin Mining for an All-In Ethereum Staking Play, Raises $163M appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Deutsche Bank All Set To Roll Out Crypto Custody Service In 2026
body: German multinational banking behemoth Deutsche Bank is extending its crypto footprint with plans to allow its clients to store cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC) next year. This move comes as global institutional adoption accelerates. Deutsche Bank Joins Forces With Bitpanda For Crypto Custody Service According to a Tuesday Bloomberg report citing people familiar with the matter, Deutsche Bank plans to roll out a digital assets custody service in partnership with the technology unit of Austria-based Bitpanda crypto exchange in 2026. Deutsche Bank-backed cryptocurrency infrastructure provider Taurus will also assist in the deployment of the crypto custody service. It remains unclear which specific cryptocurrencies will feature in the Bank‚Äôs crypto custody service. Bitcoin, the world‚Äôs largest and oldest cryptocurrency, is expected to be included in this service. In a research paper published in March, Deutsche Bank hailed the US for its decision to launch a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve, noting that it could help solve the national debt crisis. The German financial giant has been brewing plans to offer crypto custody and trading services to its customers since 2020, and applied for a digital asset custody license from Germany‚Äôs financial regulator, the Federal Financial Supervisory Authority, in 2023. Deutsche Bank‚Äôs upcoming custody initiative comes amid increasing institutional interest in digital assets, spurred by clearer EU rules under MiCA and a more lenient U.S. posture under the Trump administration. The bank is also assessing whether to foray into the stablecoin sector, including issuing its own token or joining an industry initiative, as more traditional financial players are increasingly moving into the fast-growing industry. ‚ÄúWe can certainly see the momentum of stablecoins along with a regulatory supportive environment, especially in the US,‚Äù Deutsche Bank‚Äôs head of digital assets, Sabih Behzad, said earlier this month. ‚ÄúBanks have a wide variety of options available to engage in the stablecoin industry ‚Äî everything from acting as a reserve manager, through to issuing their own stablecoin, either alone or in a consortium.‚Äù Moreover, Deutsche Bank has teamed up with the Monetary Authority of Singapore‚Äôs Project Guardian to explore an interoperable blockchain platform that provides services to tokenized and digital funds.

title: CEX Spot Trading Volume Plummets: A Crucial Shift in the Crypto Market Landscape
body: BitcoinWorld CEX Spot Trading Volume Plummets: A Crucial Shift in the Crypto Market Landscape The cryptocurrency world is always in motion, a dynamic realm of innovation and investment. However, recent data has unveiled a significant shift that demands our attention, signaling a potential turning point for market participants. Centralized crypto exchanges (CEXs), long the bustling hubs of digital asset trading, witnessed a dramatic dip in activity last month. Is this a temporary lull, or a sign of deeper, more enduring changes in the CEX spot trading volume landscape? What‚Äôs Behind the Drop in CEX Spot Trading Volume? According to insights from The Block, centralized crypto exchanges recorded a mere $1.07 trillion in CEX spot trading volume during June. This figure marks the lowest monthly total in the past nine months, a clear indicator of subdued activity across the board. For many, this sharp decline raises questions about the overall health and direction of the digital asset space. Min Jung, a perceptive analyst at Presto Research, points out that while Bitcoin has managed to maintain its strong position, hovering near its all-time highs, many other digital assets tell a different story. This divergence suggests a nuanced market where not all cryptocurrencies are experiencing the same trajectory. Bitcoin‚Äôs Resilience Amidst a Shifting Crypto Market One of the most striking observations in the current environment is Bitcoin‚Äôs remarkable resilience. Despite the overall downturn in trading volume, Bitcoin has held steady, maintaining its value close to record highs. This stability is a testament to its evolving role within the broader crypto market , often seen as a digital safe haven or a foundational asset for institutional players. Several factors contribute to Bitcoin‚Äôs robust performance: Institutional Adoption: The continued influx of institutional capital, particularly through spot Bitcoin ETFs, provides a strong demand floor. Halving Anticipation: The upcoming Bitcoin halving event continues to fuel long-term bullish sentiment, as it historically reduces the supply of new Bitcoin. Macroeconomic Hedging: Some investors view Bitcoin as a hedge against inflation and economic uncertainty, drawing parallels to traditional safe-haven assets like gold. This steadfastness of Bitcoin creates a unique dynamic, highlighting a growing maturity in the crypto market where the largest asset behaves differently from the rest. The Tale of Two Markets: Bitcoin vs. Altcoins While Bitcoin shines, the story for altcoins , including major players like Ethereum (ETH), is considerably less optimistic. Min Jung noted that many altcoins remain approximately 40% below their peak levels. This stark contrast paints a picture of a bifurcated market: Asset Category Current Performance Key Drivers Bitcoin (BTC) Steady near record highs Institutional demand, ETF inflows, halving narrative Altcoins (e.g., ETH) ~40% below peak levels Subdued retail activity, lack of fresh narratives, liquidity concerns The struggle of altcoins can be attributed to several factors. Without new, compelling narratives or significant retail excitement, liquidity tends to consolidate into larger, more established assets like Bitcoin. Many altcoin projects rely heavily on retail enthusiasm and speculative trading, which are currently in short supply. Understanding the Power of Institutional Demand The primary engine driving the current market, especially Bitcoin‚Äôs stability, is undoubtedly institutional demand . Unlike previous bull runs often fueled by fervent retail speculation, today‚Äôs market is characterized by sophisticated players making large-scale investments. This shift is profound, impacting market volatility, liquidity, and overall sentiment. What does this institutional demand look like? Spot Bitcoin ETFs: The approval and subsequent inflows into spot Bitcoin Exchange-Traded Funds have opened the floodgates for traditional finance to gain exposure to Bitcoin without directly holding the asset. Corporate Treasuries: More corporations are considering or already holding Bitcoin as part of their balance sheets, viewing it as a long-term store of value. Hedge Funds and Asset Managers: These entities are increasingly allocating portions of their portfolios to Bitcoin, driven by its performance and diversification potential. This robust institutional interest provides a significant underpinning for Bitcoin, but it also means that the broader market is less susceptible to the rapid, sentiment-driven swings that retail activity often generates. Navigating the Current Crypto Landscape: Actionable Insights Given the current market dynamics, what does this mean for you, the investor? Understanding this shift from retail-driven speculation to institutionally-led growth is crucial. Here are some actionable insights: Focus on Fundamentals: In a market driven by institutions, strong fundamentals, clear use cases, and robust technology become even more critical for altcoin projects. Risk Management: For altcoin investors, prudent risk management is paramount. Diversification and careful position sizing can help mitigate potential losses in a less liquid environment. Long-Term Perspective: The subdued retail activity and institutional accumulation suggest a market that may be consolidating for a longer-term upswing rather than immediate explosive gains. Patience is key. Monitor Institutional Flow: Keeping an eye on reports regarding institutional inflows into Bitcoin ETFs and other products can offer clues about market direction. The current phase of the crypto market is less about quick pumps and more about strategic positioning and long-term value accumulation, particularly for Bitcoin. A Market in Transformation: What Lies Ahead? The significant dip in CEX spot trading volume in June, coupled with Bitcoin‚Äôs steadfastness and altcoins‚Äô struggles, clearly indicates a market undergoing a profound transformation. The dominance of institutional demand for Bitcoin is undeniable, shaping a more mature, albeit less volatile, environment. While altcoins await a resurgence in retail interest or fresh catalysts, the broader crypto market continues to evolve, demanding a more informed and strategic approach from all participants. This period of consolidation may be laying the groundwork for future growth, but it will likely be driven by different forces than those seen in previous cycles. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action and institutional adoption. This post CEX Spot Trading Volume Plummets: A Crucial Shift in the Crypto Market Landscape first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Bitcoin: BTC-USD Tactical Breakdown (Technical Analysis)
body: Summary From a momentum standpoint, things feel like they‚Äôre losing steam. From a trade location standpoint, this is classic high-risk territory. There are a few clear scenarios in play. First is the bearish reversal from resistance. Candlestick Pattern Analysis Bitcoin‚Äôs ( BTC-USD ) been grinding sideways near the top of its recent move, and the price action is starting to look a little tired. The last few daily candles? Small bodies, upper wicks ‚Äî classic spinning tops and borderline dojis. That‚Äôs the market flashing indecision, maybe even burnout after the June rally. That surge, by the way, came with a bullish engulfing pattern that looked strong at first, but the follow-through didn‚Äôt have much gas behind it. Volume started fading right after the breakout, which often means traders are either cashing out into strength or just not that convinced. Trend Health And Momentum From a momentum standpoint, things feel like they‚Äôre losing steam. The MACD histogram has gone flat around the zero line - a signal that neither bulls nor bears have the upper hand. The MACD lines are trying to cross upward, but the move lacks urgency. RSI is hanging around 51, which is as neutral as it gets. We were in overbought territory not too long ago, but that‚Äôs cooled off. And volume? Lower on the most recent push. That doesn‚Äôt scream FOMO - it feels more like cautious interest, the kind of slow accumulation you‚Äôd expect from funds, not Reddit traders. Box Analysis Looking at it through a Box lens, Bitcoin broke out of its $75K‚Äì$88K range in April with solid conviction. Since then, it‚Äôs been carving out a new box between about $100.5K and $110.5K. Right now, it‚Äôs hovering near the top of that range but hasn‚Äôt made a clean break. No spike in volume either, which makes the breakout case a bit shaky. A strong move above $110.5K, backed by volume and a firm close, could change that fast - but we‚Äôre not there yet. The Fibonacci levels - based on the swing low near $59K and the recent peak around $110.5K - give us a clearer roadmap if we pull back. First key supports show up around $98.9K (23.6%), $91.5K (38.2%), and deeper at $84.7K (50%). On the flip side, if we get a breakout and hold above $110.5K, the next targets fall around $125K, $144K, and even up near $166K. The current market setup is sitting right at the upper edge of a box, with price hovering between $100.5K and $110.5K. It‚Äôs a spot where things tend to get tricky - candles are showing signs of indecision, and we‚Äôre seeing weak follow-through on moves higher. Volume is thinning out as price nudges resistance, and momentum indicators like MACD and RSI are offering little help, both drifting in neutral-to-weak territory. So far, there‚Äôs been no confirmed breakout to the upside, but also no convincing breakdown - just a lot of waiting and watching. Momentum Interpretation and Scenarios Ahead From a trade location standpoint, this is classic high-risk territory. There‚Äôs no edge in jumping in aggressively on either side just yet. We‚Äôre sitting at a decision point, where the next big move will likely come from a trap or a clean breakout - and right now, neither has confirmed. Patience is the best position. There are a few clear scenarios in play. First is the bearish reversal from resistance. This would show up through a bearish engulfing candle, a dark cloud cover, or an evening star formation - ideally paired with a breakdown below ~$105K on heavy volume. If that happens, the play would be to short the rejection near $110.5K, placing a stop just above the wick highs (around $111.5K), and targeting moves back down to $100.5K, then $98.9K (the 23.6% Fib), and potentially $91.5K (38.2% Fib). The thesis here: price fakes a breakout, buyers get trapped, and bears take control as volume dries up at the highs. Scenario two is the real breakout - the kind that smart money usually drives. You‚Äôd want to see a strong bullish candle close above $110.5K, ideally on a volume spike. A bullish Marubozu or solid follow-through after a smaller range candle would also fit the bill. If that‚Äôs the case, buying the breakout makes sense, with stops just below the breakout candle or around $107.5K (a former resistance level turned support). Targets would then stretch toward $125.1K (127.2% Fib extension) and potentially $144K (161.8%). This setup says: the box has broken with conviction ‚Äî time to ride the next wave up. Then there‚Äôs the trap ‚Äî the false breakout scenario. Here, price briefly pushes above $110.5K but quickly reverses, closing back inside the box. You‚Äôd likely see a long upper wick and a small candle body ‚Äî a classic bull trap with no real volume behind it. If price drops back below $110.5K (ideally under $109K), that‚Äôs your signal. The trade would be to short the failure, with a stop above the wick high (~$112K), and targets back to $100.5K and potentially $91.5K. The idea: smart money sold into the breakout, and now late buyers are left holding the bag. As for the current best read? This still feels like a ‚Äúwait for confirmation‚Äù environment. The most likely near-term outcome is a range trap unless we see a breakout backed by real volume and structure. If you‚Äôre on the sidelines, stay patient - either a clean reversal or a true breakout will offer a better entry. Disclaimer: LONG BTC. title: BREAKING: Elon Buys Bitcoin Secretly ?
body: Elon Musk has once again stirred the crypto world by liking a post on X (formerly Twitter) suggesting he might be "stacking" Bitcoin quietly. The interaction, noticed by crypto enthusiasts, has triggered fresh rumors about Musk's ongoing interest in Bitcoin and potential market moves. This isn‚Äôt Musk‚Äôs first brush with Bitcoin. Back in early 2021, Tesla made headlines by purchasing $1.5 billion worth of BTC and briefly accepting it as payment. Although Tesla later paused Bitcoin payments due to environmental concerns, the company still holds a significant portion of that Bitcoin on its balance sheet. According to its most recent filings, Tesla owns around 10,500 BTC , making it one of the largest public corporate holders. In addition to Tesla, SpaceX has also reportedly bought Bitcoin , though the exact amount remains undisclosed. Musk confirmed this during a panel in 2021, noting that both Tesla and SpaceX held BTC alongside his personal investment. His past tweets and online actions have shown an ability to move markets , and even a simple "like" from Musk often draws intense attention. With his net worth and influence, any perceived hint of Bitcoin support from Musk can fuel speculation, price movement, and renewed public interest in the cryptocurrency. While there's no confirmation that he's currently accumulating Bitcoin, this subtle social signal has once again put the spotlight on Musk's complex and influential relationship with the crypto space.

title: DP World Tour Welcomes Nexo as Official Digital Asset and Wealth Partner
body: Image: Nexo x DP World Tour The latest partnership becomes the first ever between a digital asset firm and a major professional golf tour, opening up the crypto market to millions of golf fans who watch the DP World Tour. In a landmark partnership, Nexo , one of the leading digital assets wealth platforms, will be sponsoring the DP World Tour , the main men‚Äôs professional golf tour of the European Tour group, for the next three years. The partnership sees Nexo becoming the Tour‚Äôs official digital asset and wealth partner through 2027. This strategic collaboration marks the first time a digital assets wealth firm is entering the sport, placing the partners at the forefront of global sport and finance innovation. Antoni Trenchev, Co-founder and Managing Partner at Nexo, believes the partnership will elevate Nexo‚Äôs brand and build global recognition. Speaking on the partnership with DP World Tour, Trenchev added: ‚ÄúThis partnership reflects our belief that wealth and golf are built the same way: with preparation, control, and vision. Both the DP World Tour and Nexo share a commitment to precision, discipline, and performance ‚Äì whether on the course or in finance. Golf is a natural fit for our brand: elevated, global, and principled.‚Äù The DP World Tour Schedule 2025 will feature 42 different tournaments in 26 countries and comprises three distinct phases: five ‚ÄòGlobal Swings‚Äô, the ‚ÄòBack 9‚Äô and the ‚ÄòDP World Tour Play-Offs‚Äô. It features five Rolex Series events ‚Äì the premium category of events on the DP World Tour - and four Major Championships. All these tournaments count towards the ‚ÄòRace To Dubai‚Äô rankings, the Tour‚Äôs season-long competition which concludes at the DP World Tour Championship in Dubai. Partnering with the DP World Tour sets Nexo on a higher trajectory of visibility, with notable tournaments such as the Genesis Scottish Open, featuring notable players Rory McIlroy, Scottie Scheffler, and Matt Fitzpatrick, the Betfred British Masters, the BMW PGA Championship, and the Abu Dhabi Championship, drawing millions of viewers in-season. Max Hamilton, Executive Commercial Director, DP World Tour, echoed Trenchev‚Äôs statement, stating the vision of DP World Tour mirrors Nexo‚Äôs ‚Äúforward-thinking approach to innovation and performance‚Äù. ‚ÄúJust as the DP World Tour connects global golf fans using the latest technologies, Nexo is reshaping wealth-building with digital tools,‚Äù Hamilton added. ‚ÄúOur audience is global, affluent, and financially savvy, making this partnership a powerful platform for strategic engagement.‚Äù Re-Imagining Golf With Nexo‚Äôs Partnership The partnership will also see Nexo become a name sponsor in the upcoming tournament at the iconic Trump International Golf Links in Aberdeenshire, Scotland, from August 7-10, 2025. Now renamed ‚ÄúNexo Championship‚Äù, the event will mark Nexo‚Äôs bold entry into global sports sponsorship, fusing prestige, performance, and innovation in one of the most revered settings in the sport. Nexo aims to redefine the relationship between the prestige of golf and the rising digital assets wealth market. At each event, Nexo will activate premium hospitality and bespoke experiences that align with the company's white-glove, custom services for high-net-worth clients. Strategic, high-impact branding on and off the course will reflect Nexo‚Äôs and DP World Tour‚Äôs shared values of discipline, precision, and long-term performance, mirroring Nexo‚Äôs approach to building sustainable wealth. Since its launch, Nexo has become a leading digital wealth firm, operating in over 150 countries worldwide. The firm boasts $11 billion in AUM and $320 billion processed, bringing lasting value to customers and institutions. Nexo helps its clientele manage, preserve, and grow their crypto holdings. This new partnership is a cornerstone of Nexo‚Äôs international presence, reinforcing its mission to drive the next generation of wealth. This collaboration signals the rise of a new kind of partner in elite golf: digital-first, innovation-led, and globally minded. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

title: Long-Term Bitcoin Holders Near Pain Point Last Seen In October 2024
body: According to CryptoQuant analyst Darkfost, long‚Äëterm Bitcoin holders are sitting on unrealized gains last seen during the October 2024 market dip. Right now, those holders show an average profit of 220% on coins they bought and held for the long run. That figure is surprisingly low given Bitcoin‚Äôs recent surge back above $107,000. Related Reading: Ethereum Network Awakens‚ÄîMassive On-Chain Moves Signal What‚Äôs Coming Lower Profit Levels Than Previous Peaks Darkfost used the MVRV ratio ‚Äî market value relative to the average cost paid by long‚Äëterm holders ‚Äî to track these shifts. In March 2024, when Bitcoin pushed up to $74,500, MVRV hit 300%. Then in December 2024, at the $108,000 peak, it climbed to 350%. By contrast, today‚Äôs 220% gain reflects the fact that many long‚Äëterm holders bought in at much higher levels than earlier in the cycle. Price Needs To Rise To Match Past Gains Based on an average cost basis of $33,800, Bitcoin would need to climb back to $135,200 just to restore that 300% profit level. If the market aimed to hit the 357% mark again, prices would have to reach roughly $154,400. Both figures track with what history tells us about investor behavior ‚Äî people tend to sell when profits hit big round numbers. üìâ Unrealized profits of LTH continue to decline and are now approaching levels last seen during the October 2024 correction. The average unrealized profit, based on the MVRV ratio, currently stands at around 220%. That may seem high for BTC, but when compared to previous‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/NeTCmXZVTY ‚Äî Darkfost (@Darkfost_Coc) July 1, 2025 Historical Cycle Comparisons Looking farther back shows how much room remains. In December 2017, at the $19,500 top, long‚Äëterm holders saw unrealized profits of 4,000%. Then during the 2020/2021 cycle, Bitcoin spiked to $63,000 in April 2021 and MVRV topped out at 1,230%. By November 2021, prices hit about $68,400 but unrealized gains for long‚Äëterm holders had already fallen to 340%. An analyst‚Äôs recent outlook lines up with this math, first pegging a cycle top at $135,000 in October 2024. After reviewing new data in May 2025, they revised the target range to $120,000‚Äì$150,000 and suggested a likely peak between August and September 2025. That range overlaps with the price levels needed to bring MVRV back to earlier highs. Room For More Upside, But Watch The Risks Based on latest figures, Bitcoin is trading at $106,750, roughly flat over the last 24 hours. Lower profit margins mean fewer long‚Äëterm holders are itching to sell right now, which could leave more fuel for higher prices. Still, on‚Äëchain numbers don‚Äôt capture the whole picture. Spot-market flows, ETF moves and wider economic shifts can all trigger sharp reversals. Related Reading: Insane Or Insightful? VC Firm Says XRP Could Reach Nearly $9,000 In Just 5 Years For now, the evidence points to a market that isn‚Äôt overheated. If Bitcoin follows past cycles, it may have farther to climb before long‚Äëterm holders lock in gains at levels seen in March or December 2024. But investors should balance these on‚Äëchain metrics with real‚Äëworld signals ‚Äî and be ready for whatever comes next. Featured image from Imagen, chart from TradingView

title: German Banking Giant Deutsche Bank Launches Initiative to Launch Euro Index Stablecoin! Here Are the Details
body: AllUnity, a joint venture formed by Deutsche Bank with its investment management arm DWS, digital asset firm Galaxy and market maker Flow Traders, is preparing to launch a MiCA-compliant euro stablecoin after receiving an electronic money institution (EMI) license from Germany‚Äôs financial regulator BaFin. Deutsche Bank‚Äôs DWS Unit Launches German-Regulated Euro Stablecoin in Partnership with Galaxy and Flow Traders The newly launched digital asset EURAU will be 100% collateralized and will provide institutional-level transparency. According to AllUnity, this transparency will be achieved through regular proof of reserves and regulatory reporting. EURAU aims to deliver seamless integration for regulated financial institutions, fintechs, corporate treasury management (ERP) systems and corporations, enabling 24/7 seamless cross-border payments across Europe and beyond. The initiative joins the ranks of euro-pegged stablecoin projects following the entry into force of the European Union‚Äôs Crypto Asset Markets Regulation (MiCA) framework. In addition to EURAU, Circle's EURC, Soci√©t√© G√©n√©rale's EURCV, and among dollar-based stablecoins, Soci√©t√© G√©n√©rale's USDCV and Robinhood-backed Global Dollar (USDG) are also on the market with licenses under MiCA. AllUnity CEO Alexander H√∂ptner, drawing attention to the importance of the EMI license, said: ‚ÄúThis license is not just a regulatory hurdle to overcome, it is the foundation of a secure, transparent and regulatory-compliant digital payment infrastructure for European and global markets.‚Äù AllUnity‚Äôs stablecoin initiative aims to provide a decentralized finance (DeFi)-compatible, regulated and enterprise-friendly alternative to Europe‚Äôs digital payment infrastructure. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: German Banking Giant Deutsche Bank Launches Initiative to Launch Euro Index Stablecoin! Here Are the Details

title: Google Gemini Predicts XRP Price for July 31, 2025
body: To kickstart July, we prompted Google‚Äôs Gemini AI for insight into XRP‚Äôs trajectory for the month and its potential price by July 31. Gemini considered multiple factors, including recent momentum, regulatory developments, and macroeconomic conditions, and provided a bullish prediction that could see XRP reach its highest level since 2018. XRP is currently trading at $2.19, up 0.29% from the previous day, and has been showing signs of strength amid a broader market recovery. Catalysts Behind the Forecast Gemini based its response on current trends, XRP‚Äôs historical behavior, and known catalysts. The AI highlighted Ripple‚Äôs continued expansion into real-world asset (RWA) tokenization, institutional partnerships, and U.S. political shifts favorable to crypto. These factors have created a more favorable environment for XRP, especially as use cases, such as tokenization , become more prominent. One of the key elements shaping Gemini‚Äôs assessment is XRP‚Äôs regulatory status. Ripple recently dropped its appeal against the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), and Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse expects the SEC to do the same. With the end of the long-running legal battle on the horizon, XRP could be on the verge of a massive surge, as market participants anticipate an influx of institutional investors and adoption in the U.S. once the legal battle officially ends. Gemini also considered the broader crypto market environment, particularly the role of Bitcoin. According to the AI model, XRP‚Äôs price performance is partially dependent on BTC remaining above $90,000 by late July. Historically, altcoins like XRP tend to benefit from strong Bitcoin-led market momentum, especially when accompanied by increased liquidity and capital inflows across the sector. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 XRP Price Forecast for July 31 Based on this analysis, Gemini predicted that XRP will trade between $2.7 and $3.5 by July 31. The AI described this as a ‚Äúrealistic near-term range assuming no black swan events or abrupt crashes.‚Äù While some in the XRP community anticipate larger moves, Gemini was clear that without additional factors, such as a spot ETF approval , a major rally above current levels is unlikely in the short term. Gemini‚Äôs forecast reflects optimism for XRP, grounded in present-day trends rather than speculation. With Ripple continuing to expand its utility offerings and political sentiment in the U.S. shifting in favor of crypto, XRP is positioned for stable growth. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author‚Äôs personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid‚Äôs opinion. Readers are advised to conduct thorough research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. title: Coinbase Acquires Liquifi in Fourth Major Deal of 2025
body: The post Coinbase Acquires Liquifi in Fourth Major Deal of 2025 appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Coinbase has acquired token management platform Liquifi, marking its fourth acquisition of 2025, as reported by Fortune. This move follows an already aggressive acquisition streak by the U.S.‚Äôs largest crypto exchange, which includes crypto ad firm Spindl, privacy protocol Iron Fish, and a record-breaking $2.9 billion deal for Deribit in May. Terms of the Liquifi deal were not disclosed. Meanwhile, following the news, COIN stock has risen nearly 2% in pre-market trading today, bouncing back after a 4.33% drop yesterday. JUST IN: Coinbase acquires Liquifi amid a surge in cryptocurrency mergers and acquisitions. pic.twitter.com/SOVl6rcR8X ‚Äî Whale Insider (@WhaleInsider) July 2, 2025 Strengthening the foundation Liquifi helps crypto companies manage token ownership, track vesting schedules, and handle tax obligations. Big players like Uniswap Foundation, OP Labs, and Zora already rely on its tools. With this acquisition, Coinbase is adding key infrastructure that supports the full life cycle of a cryptocurrency project. According to Aklil Ibssa, head of corporate development at Coinbase, the goal is to make token creation and management simple enough for mass adoption. Echoing a similar sentiment, Max Branzburg, Head of Consumer Products at Coinbase, shared his excitement about partnering with Liquifi to help more businesses move on-chain. He highlighted the need for simpler tools to manage coin tables, legal and tax hurdles, vesting, and asset distribution as the on-chain ecosystem grows. End-to-End Platform in Progress This acquisition moves Coinbase closer to becoming a complete crypto platform. While exchanges like Binance and OKX offer token launchpads, Coinbase has focused more on listings and trading. With Liquifi, Coinbase is stepping earlier into the token process, covering everything from creation to compliance. Liquifi is not a launchpad but gives Coinbase the tools to support projects long before tokens hit the market. This positions the company to earn value throughout the token‚Äôs entire journey, not just after launch. [post_titles_links postid=‚Äù477768‚Ä≥] Backed Despite Legal Noise Liquifi is currently facing a lawsuit from a competitor over alleged document theft. Despite the ongoing legal case, Coinbase remains confident in its decision and has promised to support Liquifi through the process. The company says it conducted a thorough review before finalizing the deal. Crypto M&A Heats Up Coinbase is not the only one making moves. Earlier this year, it bought Deribit for 2.9 billion dollars , the largest crypto acquisition to date. Meanwhile, Stripe acquired stablecoin startup Bridge and wallet firm Privy, showing a growing appetite for consolidation across the industry. With Liquifi now in its corner, Coinbase is building not just for today‚Äôs crypto needs but laying the groundwork for the future. [article_inside_subscriber_shortcode title=‚ÄùNever Miss a Beat in the Crypto World!‚Äù description=‚ÄùStay ahead with breaking news, expert analysis, and real-time updates on the latest trends in Bitcoin, altcoins, DeFi, NFTs, and more.‚Äù category_name=‚ÄùNews‚Äù category_id=‚Äù6‚Ä≥] FAQs What is Liquifi and why did Coinbase acquire it? Liquifi is a token management platform. Coinbase acquired it to support token creation, vesting, and compliance across crypto projects. How does Liquifi help Coinbase expand its crypto services? Liquifi enables Coinbase to manage tokens from creation to compliance, expanding beyond trading into full lifecycle project support. How many companies has Coinbase acquired in 2025? Coinbase has made four acquisitions in 2025 so far: Liquifi, Spindl, Iron Fish, and Deribit in a $2.9 billion deal.
